statements: UPDATE pricing_impact_analysis SET price = 29.99, revenue = 29999.99 WHERE product_id = 101 AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE pricing_impact_analysis SET revenue = 25000.00, sales_volume = 500 WHERE product_id = 102 AND date = '2022-02-20';
UPDATE pricing_impact_analysis SET price = 100.50, revenue = 1500.75 WHERE product_id = 101 AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE pricing_impact_analysis SET sales_volume = 500, revenue = 2000.00 WHERE date = '2022-11-30' AND product_id = 102;
UPDATE sales_performance SET units_sold = 50, revenue = 3000.00 WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND product_id = 101
UPDATE pricing_changes SET new_price = 25.99, reason = 'Market demand' WHERE change_id = 101
UPDATE sales_performance SET units_sold = 100, revenue = price * 100 WHERE date = '2022-09-15' AND product_id = 101;
UPDATE pricing_changes SET new_price = old_price * 1.1, reason = 'Inflation Adjustment' WHERE change_date = '2022-09-15' AND product_id = 101;
UPDATE pricing_changes SET price = 99.99 WHERE product_id = 123 AND start_date = '2022-05-01';
UPDATE sales_performance SET quantity = 100, revenue = 1500.50, date_sold = '2022-06-15' WHERE sale_id = 456;
UPDATE pricing_changes SET price = 25.99, end_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE id = 101 AND product_id = 201
UPDATE sales_performance SET revenue = 15000.75, quantity = 100 WHERE sale_id = 301 AND date_sold = '2023-09-15'
UPDATE SalesPerformance SET revenue = revenue + 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PricingChanges SET new_price = 25.99, date = '2023-01-15' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE SalesPerformance SET quantity = 50, revenue = price * 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PricingChanges SET new_price = old_price * 1.1 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE sales_data SET price = 15.99, quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 10 WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE pricing_history SET new_price = 19.99, change_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE pricing_id = 54321;
UPDATE sales_data SET price = 25.75, quantity_sold = 100 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE revenue SET total_sales = 5000.75, forecast_date = '2023-08-15' WHERE product_id = 201;
